title: New: Mental Bend – Take My Hand
body:
German duo [**Mental Bend**](http://www.facebook.com/mentalbend) blends a disarming dream pop sensitivity inside its fragile electronic world. **Sissip**‘s stunningly velvet vocals co-exist in perfect harmony with **Hendrik**‘s digital orchestration, managing to sound somewhere between a luminous **XX** and a Dionysian **Jessie Ware. ****Take My Hand** is here to enslave your senses with its soulful, late night groove and minimal simplicity that proves to be so rich and colourful like fireworks in the sky. 2014 looks great so far….

Download **Mental Bend**‘s debut EP [over here](http://mentalbend.bandcamp.com/album/mental-bend-ep-prelistening)

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/128831841″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
